EmailTemplate.subject: High quality healthcare without the hassle
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your clients want to provide a comprehensive suite of health services and tools to their members HealthiestYou embodies high‑quality healthcare without the hassle. This virtual care solution is designed to serve the unique needs of small businesses and their employees. HealthiestYou Complete Bundle members can connect to doctors with $0 visit fees, get expert opinions and save money on prescriptions with our intuitive, easy‑to‑use platform. Proven engagement strategies - 92% resolution rate - 90% member satisfaction - 35%‑40% first‑year utilization About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
